Requirements You're within 30 feet of an ally with the dying condition.

The sight of an ally near death overwhelms you with sorrow. In an act of frustration, you unleash a mournful, keening howl that forces your enemies to share in your heartbreak. You deal @Damage[floor((@item.level - 1)/2)d6[mental]|traits:nonlethal] nonlethal mental damage to all enemies in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] (@Check[will|against:class-spell|basic] save using your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher). The damage increases by 1d6 for every two levels you have beyond 13th.
